page.title: 18BOSTON W. TRADITIONAL GAMES
page.content: All you need to play{french skipping is a piece of long elastic,and some people to play it.You start the game when someone jumps in and sings a skipping song.To play{conkers}you need a conker from a{Horse Chestnut tree and a piece of string.Make a hole in the conker and thread the string through it.All you have to then is to try and knock the opponents conker in half.In{hopscotch}you have a grid of ten squares ,you have one then two squares.Then you have to find a stone.It is for two or more players.The aim of the game is for the first person to reach the other end.{Marbles}are made of glass and you can get many different sizes and colours.Here are a few different kinds of marbles Chinas,Bigies and Spiders,most of the names come from the shape.
